entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
